Independent Association of Publishers' Employees Records
Series I: Bylaws, Constitutions and Minutes
Series I: Bylaws, Constitutions and Minutes

Series contains the bylaws of the union, copies of the incorporation documents for both the Dow Jones Employees Association and the Independent Association of Publishers' Employees, and minutes of the union's Board of Directors meetings.
